intro: THE ULTIMATE PICKLEBALL EXPERIENCE – PLAY LIKE A PPA PRO
description:
Step onto the court and test your skills in the most authentic, realistic Pickleball game! Face off against top pros like Anna Leigh Waters, Ben Johns, and other PPA stars. Experience the thrill of the fastest-growing sport in America with unmatched gameplay!

•	PPA TOUR ACTION – REAL TOURNAMENT, REAL PLAY
If it’s on the court, it’s in the game! Play on iconic championship courts with TV-style broadcast commentary and motion-captured animations straight from the pros.

•	CHASE THE TRIPLE CROWN – DOMINATE THE TOUR
Rise to the top of the PPA Tour in Career Mode! Level up your player, test your skill against advanced AI built from real professional matches, and prove you’ve got what it takes to win the Triple Crown!

•	CREATE-A-PICKLER – YOUR STYLE, YOUR GAME
Design your player and partner exactly how you want! Customize their look, outfits, paddles, and accessories to match your personal flair — your court, your rules!
